page.title: 03GALA DAY/EDUCATION
page.content: Gala day.Children take part as queen and her court.Organisations and court march to collect the Queen who goes in an open horse drawn carriage for the crowning ceremony at Fountain Green. Later the local children are given a picnic bag and there are sports. Education-Paradykes Primary School is an open plan school for children up to P7.There are 3 areas and a annexe.To commemorate it's opening in Jubilee yr they are named Holyrood,Windsor.Glamis and Balmoral. Roslin primary is an open plan school with 3 areas each holding 3 classes. Each area has a noisy/quiet room which is soundproof.There is a gym which is also the dining hall and a room where we watch tv.Each area has a reference book corner where we can find facts to help us with enviromental studies,a story book corner,a maths equipment
